amendatorysection.para: For purposes of the Small Business Innovation Act:
(1) Department means the Department of Economic Development;

(2) Nebraska-based growth business means a corporation, partnership, limited liability company, limited partnership, or limited liability partnership registered with the Secretary of State that has two to fifty employees and annual sales revenue of no less than five hundred thousand dollars and no more than two million five hundred thousand dollars; and
(3) Small business innovation means the provision of technical resources to locally owned and operated Nebraska-based growth businesses to foster development, growth, and high-wage job creation.
